provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Reciprocal Enforcement of
Foreign Judgments Order, 1936.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. It is ordered that-
      (1) Part I of the Act shall extend to the United Kingdom: and
      (2) the House of Lords, the Supreme Court of Judicature of
          England and Wales (Court of Appeal and High Court of
          Justice) the Courts of Chancery of the Counties Palatine of
          Lancaster and Durham, the Courts of Sessions in Scotland and
          the Supreme Court of Northenn Ireland shall be deemed
          Superior Courts of the United Kingdom for the purpose of
          Part I of the Act.
-
                  P%c inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 4119761
